front.title: Preamble Acquisition of MPEG-TS Multicast Sessions

abstract.t: MPEG2-TS is a container format that describes the schema of the audio, video content and the in-band control information. The format information called MPEG2-TS preamble must be acquired before a RTP receiver processed any data received in MPEG2-TS. In this document, a Retransmission Server is specified to deliver MPEG2-TS preamble prior to unicast RTP packets. The Retransmission Server caches raw RTP packets with MPEG2-TS preamble information, and sends them to the RTP receiver which initiates rapid acquisition of MPEG2-TS multicast sessions.
